# Stricken Heart (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Death Spells|death]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]], [[3rd Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 3]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 194

This spell covers your hand with a writhing black aura. As part of casting the spell, you can make a melee touch attack that deals 2d6 points of negative energy damage and causes the target to be [[Staggered|staggered]] for 1 round. If the attack is a critical hit, the target is [[Staggered|staggered]] for 1 minute instead. Creatures immune to precision damage are immune to the [[Staggered|staggered]] effect.
